list_definition.definition: a piece of glass or metal having a surface that reflects an image

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She spends a lot of time looking in the mirror.

list_definition.definition: to reflect as a mirror does

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The smooth surface of the lake mirrored the surrounding mountains.
